ygData.subject: Re: [spoiler] Shimmering Orb
ygData.msgSnippet: No but I figure with all the heat I ll be getting in combat I will opt for the AC when fighting normals dual wield when attacking casters.  That much AC with
ygData.messageBody:
No but I figure with all the heat I'll be getting in combat I will opt for
the AC when fighting 'normals' dual wield when attacking casters. That much
AC with my agility mods will make a heck of a difference, and my teensy dual
wield damage will not. I could change my mind after I try it I suppose but
I doubt it, I've tried with and without shield already and there is a huge
difference in the amount I'm hit and the amount I'm hit for when I do get
hit.

Kitasi of E'ci
Dual wield? So I get two chances to miss?

-----Original Message-----
From: CMai [mailto:CMai@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 12:34 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [eqbards] [spoiler] Shimmering Orb


From: CMai <CMai@...>

I have a question. Why would a bard want this after dual wield, except for
money/trade? Is it that we can put it in our range slot?

Your Friendly Rogue and Bard
Hammerpaw and Syren Wind
Champions of Norrath, The Rathe
